noun.description: Chiefly Ice Hockey. A player whose principal duty is to defend the goal by attempting to prevent the ball, puck, etc., from entering it; a goalkeeper.
Polo. As the second element in compounds denoting a polo player with a specified handicap.
Netball (chiefly Australian). A player whose principal duty is to score goals.

origin: Late 19th century; earliest use found in Evening News (London). From goal + -er.
